Package de.lases.persistence.repository

Class PaperRepository

java.lang.Object
de.lases.persistence.repository.PaperRepository
public class PaperRepository extends Object
Offers get/add/change/remove operations on a paper and the possibility to get lists of papers.

  • Constructor Details

    • PaperRepository

      public PaperRepository()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static Paper get​(Paper paper, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Takes a paper dto that is filled out with a valid id and submission id and returns a fully filled paper dto.
      Parameters:
      paper - A paper dto that must be filled with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A fully filled paper dto.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no paper with the provided id and submission id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • add

      public static void add​(Paper paper, Transaction transaction) throws DataNotWrittenException, KeyExistsException
      Adds a paper to the repository.
      Parameters:
      paper - A fully filled paper dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      KeyExistsException - If there is already a paper with the same id and submission id in the repository.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the paper is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • change

      public static void change​(Paper paper, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Changes the given paper in the repository.
      Parameters:
      paper - A fully filled paper dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no paper with the provided id and submission id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the paper is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • remove

      public static void remove​(Paper paper, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Takes a paper dto that is filled with a valid id and submission id and removes this paper from the repository.
      Parameters:
      paper - The paper to remove. Must be filled with a valid id and submission id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - The specified paper was not found in the repository.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • getList

      public static List<Paper> getList​(Submission submission, Transaction transaction, User user, ResultListParameters resultListParameters) throws DataNotCompleteException, NotFoundException
      Gets a list all papers that belong to the specified submission.

      The papers returned are determined by the highest privilege, which that user possesses on that submission.

      Parameters:
      submission - A submission dto filled with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      user - The user who requests the papers.
      resultListParameters - The ResultListParameters dto that results parameters from the pagination like filtering, sorting or number of elements.
      Returns:
      A list of fully filled paper dtos for all papers that belong to the specified submission.
      Throws:
      DataNotCompleteException - If the list is truncated.
      NotFoundException - If there is no submission with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
      InvalidQueryParamsException - If the resultListParameters contain an erroneous option.

    • getPDF

      public static FileDTO getPDF​(Paper paper, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Get the PDF file for the provided paper.
      Parameters:
      paper - A paper dto filled with a valid paper id and submission id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A file containing the PDF for the specified paper.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no paper with the provided id and submission id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • setPDF

      public static void setPDF​(Paper paper, FileDTO pdf, Transaction transaction) throws DataNotWrittenException, NotFoundException
      Sets the PDF belonging to a specified paper.
      Parameters:
      paper - A paper dto filled with a valid paper id and submission id.
      pdf - A file dto filled with a pdf file.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      NotFoundException - If there is no paper with the provided id and submission id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • getNewestPaperForSubmission

      public Paper getNewestPaperForSubmission​(Submission submission, User user, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Takes a submission dto that is filled out with a valid id and returns a fully filled paper dto for the newest paper in that submission.
      Parameters:
      submission - A submission dto that must be filled with a valid id.
      user - The user who requests the papers.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A fully filled paper dto.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no submission with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
